gen:link.msg:message: FATAL ERROR: In table [680-51] S1303 should be equal to S0103+S0203+S0303+S0403+S0503+S0603+S0703+S0803+S0903+S1003+S1103 with margin of error [1] {{abs([680-51:R13C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$a}) - [680-51:R1C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$b}) + [680-51:R2C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$c}) + [680-51:R3C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$d}) + [680-51:R4C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$e}) + [680-51:R5C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$f}) + [680-51:R6C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$g}) + [680-51:R7C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$h}) + [680-51:R8C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$i}) + [680-51:R9C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$j}) + [680-51:R10C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$k}) + [680-51:R11C3|RPC=Quarter (Year -1)] ({$l})) <= 1}}
